title: morieneart
author: morieneart
content: Hello, it's nice to know this community!I'm selling 4 years old paypal account with transaction histories. Account condition is very good. I will only do transaction with an escrow service in bitcointalk. Escrow fee by buyer. Please do not contact me if you only want to scam people. ESCROW ONLY.Price $200.If you're interested on buying, shoot me out through PM.Thank you!

comments.author: morieneart
comments.body: Quote from: morieneart on February 10, 2023, 02:49:45 AMHello, it's nice to know this community!I'm selling 4 years old paypal account with transaction histories. Account condition is very good. I will only do transaction with an escrow service in bitcointalk. Escrow fee by buyer. Please do not contact me if you only want to scam people. ESCROW ONLY.Price $200.If you're interested on buying, shoot me out through PM.Thank you!Hello, my Paypal account is still available.Just wanna let you know about this guy on my link. He is cheater who stolen my Linode account for $20 only. Blocked my telegram and deleted all chats after he got my account. Anyway $20 isn't the big deal for me to know someone is legit or not. For others, please be careful.The guy link:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5439180.0I'm new user in here and still learn more about this web display.Can we upload the screenshoot here? If it can, i will upload all the proofs about that scammer guy. Thank you.
